```{r Part B, Q1}
warningNA <- function(x) {
  if(sum(is.na(x)) != 0) {
    warning(
      sum(is.na(x)),
      " NAs in vector removed",
      call. = FALSE
    )
  }
}

meanCalc <- function(x) {
  newVector <- x[!is.na(x)]
  sumVector <- sum(newVector)
  meanVector <- sumVector / length(newVector)
  meanVector
}

meanWarning <- function(x) {
    warningNA(x)
    meanCalc(x)
}

check <- c(NA, NA, 3, 3, 10, 2)
meanWarning(check)

```
